name: Titanium.Calendar.Alert
summary: An object that represents a single alert for an event in an calendar.

properties.name: absoluteDate
properties.description: If you set this property for a relative offset alarm, it loses the relative offset and becomes an absolute alarm.

properties.name: alarmTime
properties.summary: Date/time at which this alert alarm is set to trigger.

properties.name: eventId
properties.summary: Identifier of the event for which this alert is set.

properties.name: minutes
properties.summary: Reminder notice period in minutes, that determines how long prior to the event this alert should trigger.

properties.name: relativeOffset
properties.summary: The offset from the start of an event, at which the alarm fires.
properties.description: If you set this value for an absolute alarm, it loses its absolute date and becomes a relative offset alarm.
